Plot: An experiment in genetic engineering turns harmless sheep into blood-thirsty killers that terrorize a sprawling New Zealand farm.
Title: Black Sheep
Actors: Nathan Meister, Peter Feeney, Danielle Mason, Tammy Davis
tomatoConsensus: With an outrageous premise played completely straight, Black Sheep is a violent, grotesque, and very funny movie that takes B-movie lunacy to a delirious extreme.
